UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Peptides with potent cytolytic activity from the skin secretions of the North American leopard frogs, Lithobates blairi and Lithobates yavapaiensis.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Ahmed E, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Leprince J, Vaudry H, King JD

Literature.Title: Development of antimicrobial peptide defenses of southern leopard frogs, Rana sphenocephala, against the pathogenic chytrid fungus, Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis.
Literature.Author: Holden WM, Reinert LK, Hanlon SM, Parris MJ, Rollins-Smith LA

Literature.Title: Peptides with antimicrobial activity of the brevinin-1 family isolated from skin secretions of the southern leopard frog, Rana sphenocephala.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Halverson T, Dulka J, Platz JE, Knoop FC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=6µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(LC50=12µM),Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis(MIC=10µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=17µM)
